alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 5:29PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tulare County through 600 PM PST... At 528 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lindsay, or 10 miles north of Porterville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lindsay, Exeter, Strathmore and Springville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
